coverImage.alt: ALPINE MOBILITY BACKGROUND WITH JEEP WRANGLER OCEAN EDITION AND BRIGADE EDITION

children.text: Alpine's acoustic mastery and Rebel Off Road's legendary off-road engineering have joined forces, giving rise to an unparalleled series of custom Jeep® vehicles. To bring these visionary builds to life, they entrusted the skilled artisans at Timberline Upfitters to execute the premium installation and intricate customization.

Every detail, from the sophisticated audio integration to the exclusive vehicle add-ons, was meticulously brought to life by Timberline Upfitters' technical team. The result is a fleet where boundary-pushing sound meets uncompromising off-road performance, crafted to the highest standard.
These landmark builds are not merely for display; they are available for acquisition. This is a rare opportunity to own a vehicle born from a collaboration of industry leaders.

detailPageBgImage.alt: ALPINE - Special Edition Upfitted Jeeps: Brigade and Ocean

The result is a vehicle platform that blends

, a family-owned shop serving the Alpharetta and Cumming area since 2000. With thousands of custom trucks and Jeeps built over two decades, SORS provides the expert fabrication, precise installation, and safety-first engineering that these premium packages demand.
Together, TSport + Timberline delivers a vehicle that looks sharper, drives better, and stands apart — a perfect fusion of

detailPageBgImage.alt: TSPORT - The Ultimate Off-Road Performance Package Enthusiast driven, straight from the dealership

documents.excerpt:
TSport + Timberline Upfitters is the signature performance collaboration built exclusively at Southern Off-Road Specialists in Cumming, Georgia — bringing TSport’s racing DNA together with Timberline’s rugged, adventure-ready engineering. The result is a vehicle platform that blends racing-influenced performance with off-road confidence.

All builds are assembled at Southern Off-Road Specialists, a family-owned shop serving the Alpharetta and Cumming area since 2000. With thousands of custom trucks and Jeeps built over two decades, SORS provides the expert fabrication, precise installation, and safety-first engineering that these premium packages demand.

Together, TSport + Timberline delivers a vehicle that looks sharper, drives better, and stands apart — a perfect fusion of performance heritage and off-road craftsmanship.
documents.name: TSport

pageBuilder.htmlContent:
Just an example header

You made it to the authenticated portal for Dealer!

Effective Date: December 2025


This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) explains how Southern Off-road Specialists Company doing business as Timberline Upfitters (“Company”, “we”, “us”, or “our”) collects, uses, shares, and protects personal information when you access or use timberlineupfitters.com (the “Website”) and any related products, services, or communication channels (collectively, the “Services”).

By accessing or using the Website, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Policy. If you do not agree with this Policy, please discontinue use of the Website and Services.


1. Information We Collect

We may collect the following types of information:


Personal Information You Provide

  • Name, phone number, email address, or mailing address
  • Account information or submitted forms
  • Purchase or inquiry details

Automatically Collected Information

When you interact with the Website, we may automatically collect:

  • IP address and general location (city, region)
  • Browser type, device type, operating system
  • Pages viewed, referral links, and usage patterns
  • Cookie and tracking identifiers

Cookies & Tracking Technologies

Cookies help improve browsing experience, enable analytics, and support Website functionality. You may disable cookies through your browser settings, but some features may not function properly.


2. How We Use Your Information

Your information may be used for the following purposes:

  • To operate and maintain the Website and Services
  • To respond to inquiries, support requests, or service questions
  • To process transactions or send order-related information
  • To improve Website performance, design, and functionality
  • To send marketing communications (if consented)

3. Sharing of Information

We do not sell or rent personal information. We may share information with:

  • Service providers (hosting, analytics, payment processors)
  • Professional partners performing business functions on our behalf
  • Legal authorities if required by law or to protect our rights

4. Data Security

We implement reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect your information. However, no method of data transmission online is guaranteed to be 100% secure.


5. Data Retention

We retain information only as long as necessary for business, legal, or compliance purposes.


6. Do Not Track Signals

Some browsers include a “Do Not Track” setting. At this time, our Website may not respond to such signals.


7. Children's Privacy

The Website is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect information from minors. If information is submitted unknowingly, contact us to request deletion.


8. External Links

Our Website may include links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their content, privacy policies, or security practices.


9. Your Choices & Rights

  • Request access to personal information we hold
  • Update or correct inaccurate information
  • Request deletion where legally applicable
  • Opt-out of marketing communications

10. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Policy from time to time. Updates will be posted on this page with the revised effective date.


11. Contacting Us

If you have questions or requests regarding this Privacy Policy, you may contact us at:


Timberline Upfitters
Southern Off-road Specialists Company
Email: support@timberlineupfitters.com

Continued use of the Website signifies acceptance of this Privacy Policy.

package is a street-tuned powerhouse with a sleek, low-profile stance. Whether you’re cruising the strip or putting the hammer down, this truck delivers head-turning style and pavement-pounding performance every mile of the way.
